is_genuine.description: Indicates whether the bill is genuine or not. True means the bill is genuine, False means the bill is fake.

diagonal.description: The diagonal length of the bill in millimeters.

height_left.description: The height of the left side of the bill in millimeters.

height_right.description: The height of the right side of the bill in millimeters.

margin_low.description: The lower margin size of the bill in millimeters.

margin_up.description: The upper margin size of the bill in millimeters.

length.description: The length of the bill in millimeters.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict if it is genuine or fake.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the diagonal length.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted diagonal length?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the height on the left side.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted height on the left side?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the height on the right side.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted height on the right side?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the lower margin.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted lower margin?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the upper margin.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted upper margin?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in counterfeit detection.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the banknote, please predict the length.
